mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les regrets et complaintes de tres illustre Princesse Elizabeth d'Austriche, sur le trespas & enterrement du Roy Charles neufiesme de ce nom, son espoux
Lamentations sur la mort du roy
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Running title: Les lamentations sur la mort du roy. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Chambolle-Duru. Unidentified armorial binding, with monogram "RB" or "BR" in each corner of covers, inside. With motto, In via nulla in via. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 176. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Charles, IX, King of France, 1550-1574
Elisabeth, of Austria, Queen, consort of Charles IX, King of France, 1554-1592
